promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young basic lion electric-type pokemon wearing dark bracers. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or lion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Litobrace, a a chibi young basic lion electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: Power Gem, Reactive Blast. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lion", "electric" or "Litobrace". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, lion-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Litobrace, often found roaming stormy fields, harnesses energy from lightning to charge its Power Gem and unleash mighty Reactive Blasts.
